info.name: One-Piece

item.name: User

request.description:
## **Description:**

- Logout a specific user with token

### **Parameter in logout Use Info:**
| Parameter              | Description | Type         | In         |
| --------               | --------    | --------     | --------   |
| authorization(Required)| JWT Token   | string       | Header     |


### **Request Interface:**

```typescript
interface AuthHeader {
    authorization: string;
}

type Request = AuthHeader;
```

### **Response Interface:**

```typescript
type Response<string>;
```

## **Description:**

- Step 1 of the forget passowrd process, when user forget their password they can hit this endpoint with email to get a verify email

### **Parameter in lforget password step 1:**

| Parameter              | Description | Type         | In         |
| --------               | --------    | --------     | --------   |
| email(Required)        | user email  | string       | body       |


### **Request interface:**

```typescript
interface FPStep1 {
    email: string;
}

type Request = FPStep1;
```

### **Response interface:**

```typescript
type Response<string>;
```

## **Description:**

- Step 2 of the forget passowrd process, user has to provide the verify key in the UI of the app.

### **Parameter in forget password step 2:**

| Parameter              | Description | Type         | In         |
| --------               | --------    | --------     | --------   |
| key(Required)          | verify key  | string       | body       |


### **Request interface:**

```typescript
interface FPStep2 {
    key: string;
}

type Request = FPStep2;
```

### **Response interface:**

```typescript
type Response<string>;
```
